name: Masonry & Infinite Scroll for Genesis
author: Kaushik Somaiya

sections.description:
This plugin converts the blog & category pages of Genesis themes into beautiful masonry layout with infinite scrolling effect. Note that this is unstyled plugin and just implements masonry layout with infinite scroll effect. Major version coming soon with custom settings page.

How to use this plugin ?

Install the plugin and make sure you have featured image enabled in Genesis Theme Settings.

There are no settings as of now.

The Masonry layout is set to :

1) Front page (Latest Posts)

2) Blog Page (Set in Reading Settings)

3) Category Archives

Contact us for more customizations.

Feel free to ask any questions in the support section.
sections.installation: Download > Go to Plugins > Add New > Upload – The Zip file you downloaded.
sections.faq:
1) Featured Images not showing ?

Go to Genesis Settings > Enable Featured Images

2) Blog Page shows full post content

Go to Genesis Settings > Content Archives > Show Excerpt
sections.changelog:
2.1

Name change to Masonry & Infinite Scroll for Genesis

2.0

Bug fixes and animated loader

1.0

Masonry Layout with Infinite Scrolling
